system.requirement: Your wolf is a fierce warrior.

abilities.description: Hunter: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} using your wolf's keen senses to track your quarry, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Pack Tactics: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} alongside your wolf, add +1 and take +1 momentum.

Prey on the Weak: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} along your wolf and score a hit against a foe with progress already marked, inflict +1 harm.
